name: The Cold War Video Game
description: In this game, you play the United States during the Cold War with the Soviet Union.  You must stop Communist spies, revolutionaries, and armies from overrunning the free world.  To do this, you must build up your ability to catch spies, defend allies, and grow the economies of capitalist states.  You must also manage public opinion on the home front.  Of course, you can also roll Soviet influence back in certain parts of the world.  Winning the space race and negotiating arms control treaties can also help.  A free world is good.  A free world with a friendly Soviet Union is better.  Good luck!
